title: We Got Our Hands on the New Wahoo Elemnt Computers and Radar Light: Sea Otter Classic 2025
content:
What are Wahoo's new Elemnt Roam, Elemnt Bolt, and Trackr Radar tailight light to use? We got our hands on them at Sea Otter Classic.

Read the full article at We Got Our Hands on the New Wahoo Elemnt Computers and Radar Light: Sea Otter Classic 2025 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
